commit.message:
Donn Terry (donn@interix.com)

Donn Terry (donn@interix.com)
        * calls.c (rtx_for_function_call): Extend function pointer being
        passed to chkr_check_exec_libfunc, if needed.

From-SVN: r26838

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* calls.c (rtx_for_function_call): Extend function pointer being
+	passed to chkr_check_exec_libfunc, if needed.
+

 	* ginclude/stdarg.h (__va_rounded_size): Use long type for
